special_abilities.name: Ambusher
special_abilities.desc: . In the first round of a combat, the kenku has advantage on attack rolls against any creature it has surprised.

special_abilities.name: Mimicry
special_abilities.desc: . The kenku can mimic any sounds it has heard, including voices. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful DC 14 Wisdom (Insight) check.

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.desc: . Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Shortbow
actions.desc: . Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

name: Kenku
Languages: understands Auran and Common but speaks only through the use of its Mimicry trait
